evidence: Session TTL eviction short-circuits when map size <= cap, skipping stale cleanup.
impact: Stale Slack session state remains resident and can grow memory over time.
recommendation: Always run TTL-based sweep independent of size cap checks.

evidence: Event stream loop has no outer error handling for stream failure.
impact: Transient stream errors can crash bot process.
recommendation: Wrap stream loop in try/catch and recover gracefully.

evidence: Subscription is one-shot and lacks reconnection/backoff loop.
impact: Dropped stream can leave notifications permanently inactive.
recommendation: Add retry loop with bounded exponential backoff.

evidence: Startup timeout/abort rejects without killing spawned lobster process.
impact: Aborted starts can leak child processes and cause port/resource exhaustion.
recommendation: Kill child process on timeout/abort/error paths before reject.

evidence: Default client wrapper disables timeout by forcing `req.timeout = false`.
impact: Hung requests can block sockets and degrade reliability under failure.
recommendation: Use configurable timeout defaults and preserve abort semantics.

evidence: Startup output buffer/listeners continue growing after readiness detected.
impact: Long-running sessions retain avoidable memory and parsing overhead.
recommendation: Detach listeners and stop buffering once ready signal is matched.
